Name: Beasty Karts
About the game: Race and destroy the competition on 10 challenging race tracks. Show off your uniqueness with an assortment of stylish karts and skins to choose from. Change your weapons and stop your foes in their tracks. All that stands between you and the finish line are your opponents, some missiles, a few bombs, and a bunch of mines. * 10 challenging race tracks. * Upgradable weapons! (no additional purchases needed) * Choose from more than 30 kart and skin combinations! * 100 separate achievements Race! Chase! Crash! Crossing the finish line has never been so satisfying!
